product_name: belifAqua Bomb Hydrating Toner with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsbelif's Aqua Bomb Hydrating Toner is a lightweight water-based toner with super-hydrating hyaluronic acid, soothing honeysuckle extract and moisture-enhancing baobab tree seed extract that provides a refreshing splash of hydration. Leaves skin looking soft and smooth with a healthy-looking glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated with the same explosive hydration as belif's cult-favorite The true cream - aqua bombLightweight & absorbs instantly into skin, delivering a flood of hydration post-cleanse and prepping the skin for the next steps of your skincare regimenAn ultra-hydrating toner with Sodium Hyaluronate that soothes and refreshes skin for a healthy-looking glowKey IngredientsHoneysuckle - A soothing herb that calms the skin while promoting natural Hyaluronic Acid production for even more hydrated skinBaobab - Helps lock in moisture and prevents water lossBeta-glucan - Extracted from fermented mushrooms, this compound helps relieve irritated skin and strengthen the outermost layer of the skinSodium Hyaluronate: Helps keep skin hydratedFormulated WithoutParabensPthalatesSulfatesAnimal origin ingredientsMineral OilsSynthetic fragrancesSynthetic organic dyesPetrolatumItem 2593508How To UseMoisten a cotton pad and gently sweep across clean face. Or dispense a dime-sized amount into palm and apply to the face in a gentle patting motion after cleansing. For best results, use twice daily - morning and night.IngredientsWater/Eau, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Panthenol, PEG/PPG/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Nepeta Cataria Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Vine Sap, Sodium Hyaluronate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ester Dimethyl Silane, Trisodium EDTA, Beta-Glucan, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Glycereth-26, Phenyl Trimethicone, Tromethamine, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Polyglutamic Acid, Methylpropanediol, Malachite Extract, Butylene Glycol, Citrus Aurantium DUlcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrua Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Citral, Citronellol, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Moisten a cotton pad and gently sweep across clean face. Or dispense a dime-sized amount into palm and apply to the face in a gentle patting motion after cleansing. For best results, use twice daily - morning and night.

reviews.headline: Best toner ever!
reviews.comments: I purchased this at a great price as it's my go-to toner - does a great job, feels hydrating and smells awesome!

reviews.headline: I loved this
reviews.comments: This was moisturizing and settled my skin so nicely. I clearly saw a difference after using this. I used up my entire bottle and am now a little sad it's sold out. Hopefully they restock soon.

reviews.headline: Only toner i will ever need
reviews.comments:
I love this toner. Several years ago I tried many toners and none really did anything. I then decided to try Belief Toner since I am obsessed with the aqua bomb moisturizer. Five years later, I cannot stop buying this and I hope it's never discontinued. This helps hydrate my skin but it's the best for prepping my skin to help absorb my other product (which I had an issue with before incorporating this product into my skincare routine). 
I have combo skin leaning on the dryer side. Highly recommend giving it a try! 

p.s There is fragrance in this product so if you have sensitive skin you might want to be cautious trying this.

reviews.headline: The toner I never knew I needed
reviews.comments: I'll start by saying I typically don't use toners because they are too drying. I have been using Origins mega mushroom treatment lotion for years before moisturizing because it adds a nice layer of moisture on my skin but I was almost to the bottom of the bottle and llately I've been feeling like I could find something more effective. I've tried other products from Belif and never been disappointed, always happy with the results and never anticipating them to be as good as they ended up. This toner is no exception- my skin actually glows, it isn't irritating or drying and a little bit goes a very long way. If only I had found it years ago!

reviews.headline: For dry combination sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have dry sometimes dry/combination mature skin thats very sensitive and prone to breakouts. Toners are a a necessary step in my morning and evening skincare routine. I've tried many toners and all of them either irritated my skin; causes breakouts; or left a film/residue. This toner doesnt do any of that. It does the job and preps your face for the next steps. The best toner for my skin type.

reviews.headline: HANDS DOWN THE BEST TONER
reviews.comments: This is my favorite toner.  It's cleanses so well and does not dry my skin.  I'm always so impressed how hydrating it leaves my skin.  I'm so happy I was able to get it on sale and so please stock up if you want to try it.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I have super oily skin so i tend to stray away from hydrating products but this has really helped my skin! Super hydrating and smells good

reviews.headline: I LOVE THIS TONER
reviews.comments: This is my favorite toner of all time currently. I got it in the mini size and ive been using it for a week and a half. My skin feels so hydrated and smooth when i use it, and it sets the perfect base for the rest of my skincare. The only downside to this toner is that the fragrance is a little overwhelming. I was sort of hesitant to use it at first because i have sensitive skin, but i'm glad i tried it anyway because it hasn't bothered my skin at all :)

reviews.headline: Aqua bomb toner
reviews.comments: This product is nice, but the scent is a little strong. I would repurchase if it was scent free :(

reviews.headline: Hydrating and lightweight
reviews.comments: My very dry, very sensitive skin loves this stuff.

reviews.headline: i liked it
reviews.comments: I liked this product. I feel like if you put a lot on, it can really help hydrate your skin. I like to put it on after cleansing, then a light essence / moisturizer, and then put some more on in between steps. Haha. But it works

reviews.headline: Do not buy! Please read
reviews.comments:
The 3rd listed ingredient is "Alcohol Denat."â€¦ while yes this ingredient can be used for *some* toners, it can cause excessive dryness and disturb the natural barrier on your skin. It can also cause breakouts, skin irritation, and redness.

With this being the 3rd ingredient, stay away from this toner if you have dry skin. 

There are some good products from this brand but just stay away from this one. This is a miss for sure.

reviews.headline: Best tonet we've ever used hands down bar none!
reviews.comments: Toner is usually drying. Not this!  It's so moisturizing while making your skin feel sqreaky clean. It's a marvel.

reviews.headline: staple in my skincare routine
reviews.comments: i use this in the am + pm after cleansing. i notice i break out whenever i skip using this or only use it once a day. i've tried many toners but none of them do it for me like this one. i find many feel like an astringent and dry out my skin but this one feels good on my skin. lasts me a few months. holy grail toner.

reviews.headline: Literally Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: I have repurchased this twice now and I swear by this product!! It has helped even out my skin complexion (not 100%) but I can definitely tell a difference in my skin's plumpness. I also think this helps calm down my breakouts as the PH balance really does do something!! I will continue to repurchase. I have super dry skin and I use this at night after I cleanse and it is the only product I use in the morning after gently washing my face with water.

reviews.headline: I will be repurchasing!!!
reviews.comments: This product is amazing at taking oil and dirt out of the pores! Gives your face such a clean feeling after! ðŸ’™ðŸ’™ðŸ’™

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This toner not only cleanses and moisturizes, it also perks up your skin and tightens it.  I have sensitive, acne prone skin and this never caused me a blemish. I will buy this over and over again!

reviews.headline: The best toner ever
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and this is the first toner that actually leaves my skin feeling moisturized

reviews.headline: My favorite toner!
reviews.comments: Buy it !

reviews.headline: Best toner I've ever used
reviews.comments: I've tried a lot of "sensitive" and "alcohol free" toners and this is the only one that has ever truly been hydrating and not stripping to my skin. Leaves it feeling fresh and soft without any tightness.

This toner is no exception- my skin actually glows, it isn't irritating or drying and a little bit goes a very long way. If only I had found it years ago!

rollup.name: Aqua Bomb Hydrating Toner with Hyaluronic Acid
